mapper.insert: insert into todo (todo_id, user_id, todo_title, reg_date, start_date, end_date, days,country,city) values (todo_id_seq.nextval,#{user_id},#{todo_title},SYSDATE,#{start_date},#{end_date},#{days},#{country},#{city})
mapper.select: select * from todo where user_id=#{user_id} order by todo_id desc
